Docs.summary: A control for picking an element in a list.

remarks.para: The visual representation of a Picker is similar to a , but a picker control appears in place of a keyboard.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the index of the selected item of the picker. This is a bindable property.
Docs.value: An 0-based index representing the selected item in the list. Default is -1.
Docs.remarks: A value of -1 represents no item selected.
